Desc.eng: Have you made up your mind? What shall we do with the gate?
We don't even know yet what could happen if we break the seals. What could be worse: the unknown forces unleashed or the swarming frost spirits?
You are not expecting me to choose for you, right? Flip a coin.
No need for that. The seals were made by the Hunters Guild, and I respect their decision. We are not closing this gate.
We can't let these creatures invade the forest. Eventually they would reach the city. I'm closing the gate.
Have you made up your mind? What shall we do with the gate?
We leave it here untouched. I don't want to break the seals.
We can't let these creatures invade the forest. Eventually they would reach the city. I'm closing the gate.
We have already broken some of the seals. I might as well close this gate as well.
